medical_history.chief_complaint: Asymptomatic loose, pendulous skin confined to volar finger pads and toes.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Onset of loose skin at age 6, preceded by ill-defined erythema, warmth, and pruritus of the hands. Degree of skin laxity remained stable since childhood.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of polyarticular juvenile idiopathic arthritis diagnosed at age 3.
